        Parameters:
        roomNumber- - of the room
        roomType- - of the room-e.g computer lab, exam hall etc
        roomStart- - startTime for using room in minutes from midnight
        roomEnd- - end time for using room in minutes from midnight
        capacity- - of the room

        public Room(java.lang.String roomNumber,
    java.lang.String roomType,
    int roomStart,
    int roomEnd,
    int roomFireBreak,
    int capacity)
        Constructor for objects of type room with a fire break as well
        Parameters:
        roomNumber- - of the room
        roomType- - of the room-e.g computer lab, exam hall etc
        roomStart- - startTime for using room in minutes from midnight
        roomEnd- - end time for using room in minutes from midnight
        capacity- - of the room
        roomFireBreak- - the free time between two exams
